Subject: Post Battle tragedies
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Megatron and Waspinator had walked a day and a half and had finally 
reached the end of the mirky swamps. Now, streaching before them was a vast 
forest that rested at the foothills of a large mountian, a mountian which, 
when climed, would take them to Adrax and Autofire.
    "Waspinator! Transform into beast mode....i dont want any unsuspected 
visitors arriving." He said, as he transformed.
    The wasp did as he was told, and together in beast modes they started to 
gain altitude as they came closer to the mountian.

    Paralysis was knocked clear of the explosion, as was Aerostreak. 
Unfortunetly for Grappler and Guantix, they were killed. The fire raged on, 
and soon a few trees nearby were engulfed.
    "Aerostreak! Hey! Get up! We need to get out of here!" Paralysis yelled 
and a few trees came crashing down around them. The heat became so intense 
his armor started to bubble.
    The Hawlk was in sheer sadness over the death of his brother and sister, 
who know lay baking under a burning tree. Paralysis grabbed him, threw him 
over his shoulder, and ran as fast as he could out of the forest.

    Aracnia and Tarantulas had made great progress on the Bunker while the 
troops were gone. The shiled was working, as were the Autoguns. The spiders 
cleaned out most of the rooms, destroyed the garbage and useless items in 
there, and buitl a lab and wepons locker, and also quarters. They had been 
expecting more troops, unaware that Phobia had came and saved the day....so 
to speak.
    Black Aracnia walked down the main corridor and entered the new Command 
Room. Scince this base was not a ship, it could not be called a bridge. 
Although, further exploration of the delapidated regions of the bunker might 
provide a hanger or missle silo where ships could come and go. As the doors 
slid open, she was greeted by a slew of new Predacon Computer and several 
floating viewing screens as well as the Command Chair.
    "Tarantulas, use the scanners to locate out team." She commanded, taking 
her seat and looking to the Radar screen to her left. On it appeared a global 
map and scattered dots.
    He rhasped back to her, "Paralysis and Aerostreak are en route back here, 
as is Quickstrike. Darkmouse, according to my data, is still at the battle 
scene. Guantix and Grappler are dead....and the other Predacons are 
completely off my scanners."
    Aracnia slammed her tiny claw on the arm of the massive chair. "What do 
you mean dead? And how can all the Predacons be missing? What the hell 
happened out there?!?!" She suddenly became rather angry. "Open a channel to 
Quickstrike, now!!!"
    Tarantulas, from a small station in the Command Room, did as he was told 
and the screen changed from a radar display to a display of Quickstrike 
walking through the woods. Aracnia shook her head as she touched her comm 
unit on her collar. 
    "Sub-Commander Quickstrike! Where is Darkmouse and Kitkat's group? Tell 
me everything that happened at that Cave!!!"
